p: Ribavirin is also a broad-spectrum drug whose therapeutic potential was uncovered during 1972. This antiviral drug is used in the treatment of hepatitis C. It is usually used in combination with interferon α (IFN). This drug, approved by the FDA, competes for the active site of RdRp. Ribavirin scored 109.5 μM of half maximal concentration against SARS-CoV-2 ( Elfiky, 2020).
